Metadata.title: Home
Metadata.description: Chamana, by two Argentine sisters, blends Argentina's culinary traditions with Ibiza's Bohemian spirit. A tribute to their shamanic heritage and mystical island energy.

about.title: About
about.description: Chamana blends Argentina's rustic charm with Ibiza's allure. Enjoy tapas, herbal cocktails, and artisanal clothing at 'La Botica', celebrating shamanic traditions.

about.subTitle: About
about.title: Welcome to Chamana.
about.text: Chamana blends the rustic charm of Argentina with Ibiza's Bohemian spirit. Created by two Argentine sisters, our restaurant and boutique celebrate shamanic traditions and indigenous artistry. Enjoy tapas inspired by traditional Argentine cuisine, herbal cocktails crafted with local and sacred herbs, and discover artisanal clothing at 'La Botica', featuring limited edition pieces and handmade accessories.

tapas.subTitle: Tapas
tapas.title: A taste of Argentina
tapas.text: Our tapas menu is a celebration of Argentine cuisine, with a focus on traditional recipes, organic vegetables, and premium ingredients. From empanadas to choripan, each dish is made with love and care, using only the freshest, locally sourced ingredients. Pair your tapas with a glass of Malbec or a herbal cocktail, and experience the flavours of Argentina in the heart of Ibiza.

cocktails.subTitle: Cocktails
cocktails.title: Herbal elixirs
cocktails.text: Our cocktail menu is inspired by the healing power of herbs and plants. From the 'Chamana' – a blend of yerba mate, gin, and lemon – to the 'Pachamama' – a mix of coca leaf, pisco, and lime – each cocktail is a tribute to the island's mystical energy and the sisters' shamanic heritage. We also offer a selection of non-alcoholic cocktails, made with fresh fruit and herbs, to refresh and revitalize your spirit.

wine.subTitle: Wine
wine.title: A toast to tradition
wine.text: Our wine list features a selection of Argentine and French wines, chosen for their quality and character. From bold Malbec to crisp French whites, each wine is a reflection of the land and the people who produce it. Raise a glass to tradition and taste the terroir of Argentina and France.

mate.subTitle: Mate
mate.title: The drink of friendship
mate.text: Mate is a traditional South American drink, made by steeping dried yerba mate leaves in hot water. It's a symbol of friendship and hospitality, shared among friends and family in a circle. At Chamana, we serve mate in the traditional gourd, with a bombilla (straw) for sipping. Whether you're a seasoned mate drinker or trying it for the first time, we invite you to join us for a taste of this ancient ritual.

book.title: Reserve a table
book.text: Experience our exquisite Argentine cuisine and bohemian ambiance. Reserve a table at Chamana today.

story.subTitle: Our story
story.title: Chamana is a family affair
story.text: Chamana is the brainchild of two Argentine sisters, who share a passion for their country's culinary traditions and Ibiza's Bohemian spirit. They wanted to create a space that would reflect their heritage and love for the island, and so Chamana was born. The restaurant and boutique are a tribute to their ancestors and to the island's mystical energy.

culinary.subTitle: Culinary philosophy
culinary.title: From farm to table
culinary.text: At Chamana, we believe in the power of food to heal and nourish the body and soul. That's why we use only the freshest, locally sourced ingredients in our dishes. Our menu is a celebration of Argentine cuisine, with a focus on premium beef, organic vegetables, and traditional recipes. We also offer a selection of herbal cocktails, made with local and sacred herbs, to complement your meal.

sanctuary.subTitle: A sanctuary for the soul
sanctuary.title: Healing through art and nature
sanctuary.text: Chamana is more than just a restaurant and boutique – it's a sanctuary for the soul. Our space is designed to inspire and uplift, with its rustic decor, indigenous art, and lush garden. We also host workshops and events that celebrate shamanic traditions and holistic living. Whether you're looking to relax or recharge, Chamana is the perfect place to do so.

boutique.subTitle: La Botica
boutique.title: Discover 'La Botica'
boutique.text: At 'La Botica', our boutique, you'll find a curated selection of artisanal clothing and accessories, inspired by the island's Bohemian spirit and the sisters' Argentine heritage. From handmade limited edition pieces, each item is a work of art in itself.

commitment.subTitle: Our commitment
commitment.title: Sustainability and community
commitment.text: At Chamana, we're committed to sustainability and community. We source our ingredients from local farmers and producers, to support the island's economy and reduce our carbon footprint. By dining at Chamana, you're not just supporting a local business – you're joining a movement for positive change.
